name: RFL_ADD_PAYORS
description: This table holds information regarding additional payors listed on the referral.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RFL_PAYOR_AUTH
columns.description: The carrier authorization number for this payor

columns.name: RFL_PAYOR_PRECERT
columns.description: The precertification number for this payor
